        Parameters:
        gameTrack - is the GameTrack implementation
        map - is the chosen map implementation
        weaponDeck - is a shuffled and complete WeaponDeck
        ammoTilesDeck - is a shuffled and complete AmmoTileDeck
        powerUpDeck - is a shuffled and complete PowerUpDeck
